name: Lost and Found (GGJ 2021)
description:
Find each other and airlift your way out of a Zombie infested map in this splitscreen local co-op game!

Instructions:

- Helicopter: Arrow keys + Shift (Map)

- Tiny guy: WASD keys

Credits:

asheraryam -- programming

samirkazah -- art, level design

Submission page: https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/lost-found-5
